name: Gardenweb (Select/upload your own backgrounds)
description:
No more selectable backgrounds, widths, etc.
I don't have the energy or time when nobody else seems interested so this is now just here for my convenience.  Feel free to use it but there's no guarantee it will scale to anyone else's computer but mine. In fact, it probably will not.
obsoletion_message: Probably won't be working with this again. Houzz just doesn't seem to be worth the trouble to me personally. Even if I prettied up the appearance, it would still be... Houzz. :(
